About Me

I'm John Kihiu, a passionate Full Stack Developer

I specialize in building modern, high-performance web applications using cutting-edge technologies. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development, I create seamless digital experiences that are both beautiful and functional.

My expertise spans across Laravel, React, Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, Livewire, and more. I'm passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and am constantly exploring new technologies to enhance my skillset.

Connect with me:

Fast. Reliable. Creative.

I transform ideas into powerful web applications with a focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience.

JK
